terms.content_en: The act of the UK leaving the EU
terms.content_de: Das Verlassen der EU durch das Vereinigte Königreich

terms.content_en: European Union, consisting now of 27 member states
terms.content_de: Europäische Union, nun bestehend aus 27 Mitgliedsstaaten

terms.content_en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
terms.content_de: Vereinigtes Königreich von Großbritannien und Nordirland (e. UK / United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland)

terms.content_en: Her Majesty's Revenue and Customs, department of the UK Government
terms.content_de: Finanz- und Zollbehörde Ihrer Majestät (e. Her Majesty's Revenue and Customs), Behörde des VK

terms.content_en: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, department of the UK Government
terms.content_de: Abteilung für Umwelt, Nahrung und Ländliche Angelegenheiten (e. Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs), Behörde des VK

terms.content_en: Rural Payments Agency, executive agency of @link(Defra)
terms.content_de: Ländliche Zahlbehörde (e. Rural Payments Agency), Exekutivbehörde zugehörig zu @link(Defra)

terms.content_en: Financial Conduct Authority, an independent financial regulator in the UK
terms.content_de: Finanzhandlungsaufsicht (e. Financial Conduct Authority), eine unabhängige Finanzmarktaufsichtsbehörde des VK

terms.content_en: World Customs Organisation
World Trade Organisation
Value Added Tax
International customs and temporary export-import document in the ATA system, see: gov.uk ATA carnet webpage
Admission Temporaire / Temporary Admission system, see: WCO ATA webpage
Goods Vehicle Movement Service, new central IT system introduced by @link(HMRC) for handling the international movement of goods
terms.content_de: Waren-Fahrzeug-Bewegungsservice (e. Goods Vehicle Movement Service), neues zentrales von @link(HMRC) eingeführtes IT-System, das den internationalen Warenverkehr behandelt

terms.content_en: Customs Handling of Import and Export Freight system, pre-existing IT system of @link(HMRC) recording the movement of goods by land, air and sea
terms.content_de: Zollabfertigungsfrachtsystem für Import und Export (e. Customs Handling of Import and Export Freight system), zuvor existierendes IT-System von @link(HMRC) das Frachtbewegungen über Land, Luft und See aufnimmt

terms.content_en: Customs Declaration Service
Management Support System (an interfacing database with the @link(CHIEF) system)
Community System Providers (five independent trade systems)
Excise Movement Control System, aimed at all Excise businesses who are currently involved in the movement of goods in/under duty suspense
Import Control System, provided for the use of traders responsible for bringing goods into the EU that require Safety & Security checks and therefore @link(ENS)
New Community Transit System, a basic, free to use service, suitable for low volume users
New National Export System for traders to submit (3rd country) Export Declarations to the @link(CHIEF) system
Flexible Accounting System
Trader Front End, used to submit @link(ICS) declarations in the form of @link(XML) messages
Allows you to look up @link(commodity codes), duty and @link(VAT) rates in the @link(UK), see: gov.uk Trade Tariff webpage
terms.content_de: Ermöglicht es, @link(Warennummern), Zoll- und @link(MwSt.)-Raten im @link(VK) nachzuschlagen, siehe: Trade Tariff Unterseite von gov.uk

terms.content_en: Automatic Licence Verification System
Guarantee Management System
Cargo Community System-UK, @link(UK)'s electronic air cargo community and system containing data exchange switch and database, see: CCS-UK website
Goods Movement Record (generating @link(gmrId) and containing @link(MRN), @link(ERN), @link(DUCR), @link(EORI), @link(ATA) and @link(TIR)) - for more info, see GVMS API
terms.content_de: Warentransportdaten (e. Goods Movement Record), generiert @link(gmrId) und beinhaltet @link(MRN), @link(ERN), @link(DUCR), @link(EORI), @link(ATA) und @link(TIR) - für weitere Informationen, siehe GVMS API

terms.content_en: See: @link(ENS)
Electronic Entry Summary declarations, aka safety and security declarations, processed by @link(ICS)
terms.content_de: Zusammenfassende Elektronische Einfuhrmeldung (e. Electronic Entry Summary declarations), auch bekannt als Schutz- und Sicherheitserklärung, von @link(ICS) verarbeitet

terms.content_en: Application Programming Interface, an interface offered by one software product enabling another piece of software to communicate and integrate with it
Hierarchical database system used by CHIEF
Proprietary, yet open, operating system on which CHIEF runs
Direct Trader Input, a link to CHIEF
Web Declaration
Extensible Markup Language, used as language for messages sent via TFE to ICS
Technical Interface Specification, e.g. for ICS
Unique Consignment Reference, a DUCR structure recommended by WCO
Electronic Data Interchange for Administration, Commerce and Transport
Electronic Data Capture Service
Advance Information System, module for CCS-UK
Module for CCS-UK
Precursor to CCS-UK
Precursor to ACP go

A number containing 6, 8 or 10 digits (6 digits worldwide, 8 or 10 for trading within the @link(EU).) Based on this number, the necessary customs dusties can be looked up as well as the presence of preferential treatments, restrictions or prohibitions for import, transit and export.
terms.content_de: Eine Zahl, die aus 6, 8 oder 10 Ziffern besteht (6 Ziffern weltweit, 8 oder 10 im @link(EU)-internen Handel). Basierend auf dieser Zahl können anfallende Zölle sowie das Vorliegen von bevorzugter Behandlung oder Import/Transit/Export-Restriktionen nachgeschlagen werden.

terms.content_en: Identification number needed to register for using GVMS
Goods Movement Reference (issued by HMRC based on a GMR), looks like e.g. GMRI 0005 J2FN
Movement Reference Number, issued by ICS
Employer Reference Number, aka Employer PAYE Reference
Declaration Unique Consignment Reference, main reference key to any CHIEF declaration, see: gov.uk DUCR webpage

Economic Operators Registration and Identification number, needed to move goods between the UK and non-EU countries, and from Jan 2021 to move goods between UK and EU, see gov.uk EORI webpage and europa.eu EORI webpage
Transport International Routiers, see: gov.uk TIR newsletters
Identification number for VAT purposes
Unique Taxpayer Reference
Standard Industrial Classification code
Export Security Single Administrative Document
Value build-up sheet
Bulk importer details form
Bulk exporter details form
Single Administrative Document, refers to C88 1-8 and C88A, see: gov.uk SAD webpage
Customs Freight Simplified Procedures, see: gov.uk CFSP webpage
Procedures to be used if CHIEF system and/or the local computerised inventory control systems are not available

Fallback procedures in case of system unavailability of up to 24 hours, allow for the manual clearance of goods during fallback but require that the declaration information is later keyed into the computer system
Fallback procedures in case of system unavailability of over 24 hours, do not require the declaration information to be keyed in
Procedure for Electronic Application for Certificates
Human Computer Interface for CHIEF
Electronic Data Interchange for CHIEF
Only available via EDI
Only available via EDI
Merchandise in Baggage
Customs Input Entry
Entry Processing Unit, see: gov.uk EPU webpage
Information sheet
Front End Credibility in the CHIEF system
Pay-as-you-earn tax
Transit Accompanying Document
Authorised Economic Operator for Customs Simplifications
Common Transit Convention
